verses.name: 1 Chronicles 23:5
verses.text: Moreover four thousand were porters; and four thousand praised the Lord with the instruments which I made, said David, to praise therewith.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 23:6
verses.text: And David divided them into courses among the sons of Levi, namely, Gershon, Kohath, and Merari.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 23:7
verses.text: Of the Gershonites were, Laadan, and Shimei.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 23:8
verses.text: The sons of Laadan; the chief was Jehiel, and Zetham, and Joel, three.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 23:9
verses.text: The sons of Shimei; Shelomith, and Haziel, and Haran, three. These were the chief of the fathers of Laadan.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 23:10
verses.text: And the sons of Shimei were, Jahath, Zina, and Jeush, and Beriah. These four were the sons of Shimei.
